text: Kei khom ruoipu inchungtak rachamneina nuoia om ki nia, male ku nuoia khom râlmingei an oma. Mi inkhat kôm, ‘Se roh!’ tiin chong ke pêkin chu a se ngâia, midang inkhat kôm ‘Hong roh!’ tiin chong ke pêkin chu a hong ngâi; male ki tîrlâm kôm khom, ‘Mahi sin roh!’ ki tiin chu a sin ngâi.”
